text.text_translated:
Supermarkets did bad acts for ten years.
They threw away many tonnes of food.
They did not pay their suppliers enough money.
They put too much plastic in packaging.
This plastic hurt our environment.

But now, supermarkets are listening.
Many buyers were very angry about the plastic rubbish from packaging.
So, big UK supermarkets made a promise.
They will change their packaging.
They will use less plastic.
